locations.title: Landyachtz SideWalker
locations.body: After over a year of designing and testing Vera’s Sidewalker is finally ready for the masses. Ultra light for tricks with enough features to keep your feet happy at high speeds. What more could you ask for?

locations.title: KnK Longboard Camp 2018
locations.body: Time flies and things change but for now, KnK Longboard Camp remains. It’s a great pleasure to look back to 2009 and see what an iconic event it became over those 9 years and how much impact it made on downhill skateboarders across the globe.

locations.title: Top 12 Longboard Brands
locations.body: At the press meet held yesterday, Laderaskateboards.com had announced that they have now included the list of top 12 longboard brands for this year 2018, much to the delight of longboarding lovers to make a well informed buying decision.
